modName: Classic Nord Shield and Tartan Stormcloaks Plus Merged
summary:
This is a merge of MECRs Classic Nord Shields and Callaghan04s Tartan Stormcloaks Plus.
This Mod causes that Stormcloaks wear the Shields from MECR and the Armor from Callaghan.
Its only a merged ESP, so you have to download both Mods first.
descriptionHtml:
Description:

This is a merge of MECRs Classic Nord Shields and Callaghan04s Tartan Stormcloaks Plus.
This Mod makes that Stormcloaks wear the Shields from MECR and the Armor from Callahan.
Its only a merged ESP, so you have to download both Mods first. You need the meshes and textures but you don\'t need the esps.



Required:

MECRs Classic Nord Shields
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/12689

Callaghan04s Tartan Stormcloaks Plus
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10465


Changes to the Original Mods:

MECRs Classic Nord Shields
Stormcloaks with one-handed weapons use now the Classic Nord Shields.
There is still a small chance for using hide- or steel shield.
Bandits rarely still use them too as in the original mod.

Callaghan04s Tartan Stormcloaks Plus
Stormcloaks will only have one set of armor.
Stormcloaks will use more often shields and prefer axes and diverse helms.


############################################################################

Combatiblity and issues:
This mod may conflict with other mods that change the stormcloaks. 
Maybe you have to load this mod after the bashed patch if the stormcloaks don\'t wear the armor or have more then one armor in their inventory.


IMPORTANT:
This is only a merged ESP, so you have to ask the Creators of the original Mods to use their work.

The Creators of the original mods don\'t want their Mods uploaded to other sites than the Nexus or the TES Alliance, so don\'t do this with this merge!


############################################################################
Credits:


I didn\'t do the hard work of creating a new Mod from the scratch, so if you want to endorse do it on the the site of the creators of both Mods!

Creator of Classic Nord Shields is MECR.

Creator of Tartan Stormcloaks Plus is Callaghan04.

Many thanks for the permission to offer this merge to the community!
author: Oxythyrea
